hero.title: Professional Photography Equipment
hero.subtitle: Rent right - shoot quality - AI helps you make decisions faster

step1.title: Choose Equipment
step1.description: Select the equipment that fits your needs from our diverse catalog.

step2.title: Book Schedule
step2.description: Choose rental dates and complete your order online or by phone.

step3.title: Receive Equipment
step3.description: Pick up equipment at the store or request home delivery.

step4.title: Return
step4.description: Return equipment on time to the store or via collection service.

testimonial1.quote: High-quality equipment, professional service. I rented the Canon R5 for an advertising project and was very satisfied with its performance.
testimonial1.author: John Photographer

testimonial2.quote: Reasonable prices and simple rental process. I was particularly impressed with the condition of the equipment - everything was like new.
testimonial2.author: Sarah Wilson

testimonial3.quote: Very knowledgeable and helpful staff. They helped me choose the perfect lens set for my landscape photography trip.
testimonial3.author: Mike Chen

company.title: Nova Camera
company.description: Nova Camera Services LLC - Specializing in high-quality photography and videography equipment rental with dedicated service.
company.mission: Our mission is to provide photographers and videographers with access to professional equipment at affordable prices.
